alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Marfa Plateau (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 01 at 3:48AM CST until March 03 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Eddy County Plains. In Texas, Eastern Culberson and Central Brewster Counties, Chinati and Davis Mountains, and Marfa Plateau, Davis Mountains Foothills and Chisos Basin. * WHEN...From 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ this morning to midnight CST /11 PM MST/ Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Marfa Plateau
